item.description: Hi, I’m Kirill â€” a Software Engineer at Google working on Clangd, C++ Language Server implementation that helps you write better code in Visual Studio Code, Vim and other editors. I specialize in Compilers and Machine Learning. C++ and Python are typically my languages of choice, but I enjoy writing code in Rust and Haskell. I contribute to LLVM very often (my commits). Before I joined Google full-time I was studying at the university and interning at Google, too.
